name: Dough Get Baked
description:
**Player may take a minute or two to load for the first time**

DOUGH GET BAKED - 2d puzzle-platformer
CONTROLS

  • Zoom out - SPACEBAR
  • Move - A / D
  • Jump - W
  • Split - S
  • Control a different blob by left clicking on them
  • Quick switch - Q
  • Join - hold E to join with the closest blob
  • Alternate join - Right click on the blob you want to join with
  • Restart level - ESCAPE
  • REACH THE DIAMOND!
